title: Never Filtered Tap
content: Hawaiian Springs is Natural Artesian Water, not purified or filtered tap water. It is drawn from a deep aquifer in Mauna Loa, ensuring a purity and taste that is untouched by human hands until you open the bottle.

title: Never Tankered

title: Filtered by Lava Rock
content: Heavenly rainfall is naturally filtered through 13,000 feet of pristine volcanic lava rock. This natural purification process infuses the water with unique electrolytes and minerals, including a high content of **silica ($ ext{37mg/L}$)**.

title: Natural Artesian Water
content: Enjoy optimal hydration with a naturally alkaline pH of $ ext{7.7+}$. This composition, with its blend of minerals like silica, calcium, and magnesium, delivers a clean, soft, and slightly sweet taste.
